forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. Northeast wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 5 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Downtown San Francisco sits beneath a cloak of clouds, individual droplets glistening in the cool air. The temperature hovers gently around fifty, with a northeast breeze whispering at a steady pace, occasionally stirring the atmosphere with sharper gusts. As the day unfolds, the promise of sun emerges, casting aside the remnants of night and beckoning the city to awaken. With a high of sixty-one anticipated, locals can expect a gradual descent toward mid-fifties as afternoon approaches, a delightful shift as the heat of the day settles in.

A veil of fog may obscure some sights, but this day will transform, revealing the iconic skyline outlined against a brightening sky. As visibility improves, the beauty of the Golden Gate Bridge will emerge, standing proudly as the sun paints its surface with hues of gold. Given the brisk winds, dressing in layers is prudent—perhaps a light sweater or jacket combined with comfortable shoes, an invitation to step out and explore. A stroll through the nearby parks or a leisurely coffee at a bustling café would fit the atmosphere perfectly, allowing one to savor the invigorating embrace of winter in San Francisco. The tapestry of the city awaits, and the day promises to unfurl with calm charm.
